name: ext_R5_ExplanationOfBenefit_diagnosis
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ExplanationOfBenefit.diagnosis for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ExplanationOfBenefit.diagnosis from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExplanationOfBenefit|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Information about diagnoses relevant to the claim items.
element.comment: `ExplanationOfBenefit.diagnosis` has no related element in R2:ExplanationOfBenefit

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).
